#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n,q,i,p,a,b;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d%d",&n,&q);
		int arrive[n+5],leave[n+5],ans[n+5];
		for(i=1;i<=n+1;i++)
		{
			arrive[i]=0;
			leave[i]=0;
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
			arrive[a]++;
			leave[b+1]++;
		}
		ans[0]=0;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			ans[i]=ans[i-1]+arrive[i]-leave[i];	
		}
		for(i=0;i<q;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&p);
			printf("%d\n",ans[p]);
		}
	}
}
